ygData.subject: Re: Brass or  Wind???
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That would require me to be a LOT higher level than I currently am.  I just started RaceWar Talies on Saturday - he s only 7th level now.  No twinking, not
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:58 AM 7/19/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
>Hey! What about... Lyssa's Veracious Concord?

That would require me to be a LOT higher level than I currently am. I just
started RaceWar Talies on Saturday - he's only 7th level now. No twinking,
not really powerleveling - in fact, I even stopped to make the mail run all
over Faydwer three times, plus play in the Racewar for several hours last
night.
The closest to twinked is a Dwarf paid me a FS Longsword to lead him to a
location he couldn't find. It was worth it to him. It was worth it to me,
too *grins*

Talies the Wanderer
